name: Geneva Escape From Blur World
description:
Geneva https://www.twitch.tv/genevaleigh, 

Happy birthday, my dear!

This is a small effort your community put together to make your day special. We love you and we want you to know that.

We hope you can enjoy and beat this game. 

We wish to have more time to work on this, but these have been crazy  busy times. 

There are a few bugs (LUL), some unpolished stuff, and it is quite challenging. But it is short (3 levels and a boss) and a lot of love was put on this. 

Regards,

Presto and the dev team! :D

CONTROLS

Xbox controller:

A - Jump (Double jump if you have vitamins)
X - Run (Hold to Run)
B - Melee Attack (if you pick up the bass guitar)

Keyboard:

Space - Jump
Left-Shift - Run
Mouse 2 - Melee Attack
Alt +F4 - Exit the game
